member.name: T:Angara.Charting.AreaTitles
member.summary: Defines names of area chart axes

member.name: T:Angara.Charting.Chart
member.summary: Defines a chart as a collection plot definitions.

member.name: T:Angara.Charting.HeatmapTitles
member.summary: Defines names of heatmap axes

member.name: T:Angara.Charting.HeatmapTreatAs
member.summary: Determines whether color within each heatmap cell is interpolated or solid.

member.name: T:Angara.Charting.HeatmapValues.TabularUncertainValues
member.summary: Uncertian values are represented as 1d-array; and corresponding items of the series "x" and "y" are considered as pairs of coordinates of a grid point, i.e. x[i], y[i], and i-th element of this array together define a grid point.

member.name: T:Angara.Charting.HeatmapValues.TabularValues
member.summary: Values are represented as 1d-array; and corresponding items of the series "x" and "y" are considered as pairs of coordinates of a grid point, i.e. x[i], y[i], and i-th element of this array together define a grid point.

member.name: T:Angara.Charting.HeatmapValues
member.summary: Defines the values to be displayed as colors.

member.name: T:Angara.Charting.HeatmapX.Values
member.summary: Coordinates of grid points on horizontal axis.

member.name: T:Angara.Charting.HeatmapX
member.summary: Defines positions of points on horizontal axis.

member.name: T:Angara.Charting.HeatmapY.Values
member.summary: Coordinates of grid points on vertical axis.

member.name: T:Angara.Charting.HeatmapY
member.summary: Defines positions of points on vertical axis.

member.name: T:Angara.Charting.LineTitles
member.summary: Defines names of line chart axes

member.name: T:Angara.Charting.LineTreatAs.Trajectory
member.summary: The data points are rendered in the original order.

member.name: T:Angara.Charting.LineTreatAs.Function
member.summary: The data points are ordered prior to rendering by increasing 'x'.

member.name: T:Angara.Charting.LineTreatAs
member.summary: Determines whether the data points must be ordered or not.

member.name: T:Angara.Charting.LineX.Indices
member.summary: Indicates that positions are indices of the LineY array.

member.name: T:Angara.Charting.LineX
member.summary: Defines positions of data points on horizontal axis. It can be an array of real values.

member.name: T:Angara.Charting.LineY.UncertainValues
member.summary: Values are uncertain and represented as array of quantiles. Quantiles will be displayed as colored bands.

member.name: T:Angara.Charting.LineY.Values
member.summary: An array of real values.

member.name: T:Angara.Charting.LineY
member.summary: Defines positions of data points on vertical axis. It is either an exact values or uncertain values.

member.name: T:Angara.Charting.MarkersColor.UncertainValues
member.summary: Markers are rendered as 'bull-eyes' when combination of two colors indicates level of uncertainty.

member.name: T:Angara.Charting.MarkersColor.Values
member.summary: Marker colors are bound to these values through color palette.

member.name: T:Angara.Charting.MarkersColor.Value
member.summary: All markers are rendered using this color.

member.name: T:Angara.Charting.MarkersColor
member.summary: Defines colors of markers. It can be a single color, or an array of real values bound to a color palette, or an array of uncertain values.

member.name: T:Angara.Charting.MarkersSize.UncertainValues
member.summary: Markers are rendered as 'petals' when shape of a marker indicates level of uncertainty.

member.name: T:Angara.Charting.MarkersSize.Values
member.summary: Marker sizes are bound to these values through size range.

member.name: T:Angara.Charting.MarkersSize.Value
member.summary: All markers are rendered of this size in pixels.

member.name: T:Angara.Charting.MarkersSize
member.summary: Defines sizes of markers. It can be a single value in screen pixels, or an array of real values bound to a size range in pixels, or an array of uncertain values.

member.name: T:Angara.Charting.MarkersSizePalette
member.summary: Defines size palette which can be either normalized or absolute.

member.name: T:Angara.Charting.MarkersTitles
member.summary: Defines names of marker chart axes

member.name: T:Angara.Charting.MarkersX.Values
member.summary: An array of real values.

member.name: T:Angara.Charting.MarkersX
member.summary: Defines positions of markers on horizontal axis.

member.name: T:Angara.Charting.MarkersY.UncertainValues
member.summary: Values are uncertain and represented as array of quantiles. The markers will be rendered as box-and-whisker plots.

member.name: T:Angara.Charting.MarkersY.Values
member.summary: An array of real values.

member.name: T:Angara.Charting.MarkersY
member.summary: Defines positions of markers on vertical axis. It is either an exact values or uncertain values.

Displays data as a collection of points, each having the value of one variable determining the position on the horizontal axis and the value of the other variable determining the position on the vertical axis.

Displays data as a collection of points, each having the value of one variable determining the position on the horizontal axis and the value of the other variable determining the position on the vertical axis.

member.name: T:Angara.Charting.PlotInfo
member.summary: Defines a plot as a collection of properties.

member.name: T:Angara.Charting.QuantileArray
member.summary: Contains quantiles describing a series of continuous probability distributions.

member.summary: Allows to set titles for line chart axes

member.summary: Allows to set titles for heatmap chart axes
